p: PU (Medical grade Tecoflex EG 80A) was supplied by Lubrizol, Wickliffe, OH, USA. PM oil was purchased from AEON, Johor, Malaysia. Copper sulphate (CuSO 4.5H 2O) was supplied by Sigma-Aldrich, Gillingham, UK. The solvent for PU is Dimethylformamide (DMF) which was obtained from Merck, Burlington, NJ, USA. The reagents utilized in clotting study was obtained from Diagnostic Enterprise, Thiruvananthapuram, India.
